1.16.2.1.4.2: You can choose a controller from a list of all connected devices.
1.16.2.1.4.1: Forge version 33.0.22 and button mouseClick exception fixed.
1.16.2.1.4.0: Drag and lift physics of props are now simulated correctly. Drone build can be customized to achieve different flight characteristics.

1.16.1.1.3.3: Custom angle rounded to nearest degree.

1.15.2.1.3.2: Allow axis channels to be assigned as a switch. Every channel can be flipped.
1.15.2.1.3.1: Fix crash caused by pressing space bar in settings.
1.15.2.1.3.0: Armed players render as floating heads.
1.15.2.1.2.0: Right click using controller. When armed, hide GUI except for chat.
1.15.2.1.0.3: Slight lag spike handling improvement. Works on server.
1.15.2.1.0.2: Support custom camera angle with pot on CH5.
